getByShift: SELECT Shift, COUNT(*) AS ShiftwiseCount FROM Attendance  GROUP BY Shift
getByCabin: SELECT CabinNo, COUNT(*) AS CabinwiseCount FROM Attendance GROUP BY CabinNo;
getpresenteecount: SELECT COUNT(*) AS PresentCount FROM Attendance WHERE IsPresent = 1
getbreakfastcount: SELECT COUNT(*) AS BreakfastCount FROM Attendance WHERE Breakfast='Yes';
getLunchcount: SELECT COUNT(*) AS LunchCount FROM Attendance WHERE Lunch='Yes';
getDinnercount: SELECT COUNT(*) AS DinnerCount FROM Attendance WHERE Dinner='Yes';
